00029 #include "AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel.hpp"
00030 #include "Exception.hpp"
00031 
00032 AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel::AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel()
00033 {
00034 }
00035 
00036 AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel::~AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel()
00037 {
00038 }
00039 
00040 void AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel::Initialise()
00041 {
00042     SetG1Duration();
00043 }
00044 
00045 void AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel::InitialiseDaughterCell()
00046 {
00047     AbstractCellCycleModel::InitialiseDaughterCell();
00048     SetG1Duration();
00049 }
00050 
00051 void AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel::SetG1Duration()
00052 {
00053     assert(mpCell != NULL);
00054 
00055     switch (mCellProliferativeType)
00056     {
00057         case STEM:
00058             mG1Duration = GetStemCellG1Duration();
00059             break;
00060         case TRANSIT:
00061             mG1Duration = GetTransitCellG1Duration();
00062             break;
00063         case DIFFERENTIATED:
00064             mG1Duration = DBL_MAX;
00065             break;
00066         default:
00067             NEVER_REACHED;
00068     }
00069 }
00070 
00071 void AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel::ResetForDivision()
00072 {
00073     AbstractCellCycleModel::ResetForDivision();
00074     mBirthTime = SimulationTime::Instance()->GetTime();
00075     SetG1Duration();
00076 }
00077 
00078 void AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel::UpdateCellCyclePhase()
00079 {
00080     double time_since_birth = GetAge();
00081     assert(time_since_birth >= 0);
00082 
00083     if (mCellProliferativeType == DIFFERENTIATED)
00084     {
00085         mCurrentCellCyclePhase = G_ZERO_PHASE;
00086     }
00087     else if (time_since_birth < GetMDuration())
00088     {
00089         mCurrentCellCyclePhase = M_PHASE;
00090     }
00091     else if (time_since_birth < GetMDuration() + mG1Duration)
00092     {
00093         mCurrentCellCyclePhase = G_ONE_PHASE;
00094     }
00095     else if (time_since_birth < GetMDuration() + mG1Duration + GetSDuration())
00096     {
00097         mCurrentCellCyclePhase = S_PHASE;
00098     }
00099     else if (time_since_birth < GetMDuration() + mG1Duration + GetSDuration() + GetG2Duration())
00100     {
00101         mCurrentCellCyclePhase = G_TWO_PHASE;
00102     }
00103 }
00104 
00105 void AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel::OutputCellCycleModelParameters(out_stream& rParamsFile)
00106 {
00107     // No new parameters to output
00108 
00109     // Call method on direct parent class
00110     AbstractCellCycleModel::OutputCellCycleModelParameters(rParamsFile);
00111 }
